title: The Jade Sea
description: Home to lost treasures, never before seen aquatic creatures and the old fauna of the Arunaâ€™s oases.

title: Fishing Rod
description: An invaluable tool left behind by the old inhabitants of the desert region. Useful for capturing species at the bottom of the food chain.

title: Koi
description: Fluorescent Koi do not belong in the salt filled Jade Sea, they prefer pure and tranquil sources of water where they absorb light energy to continuously cleanse their home.
